net.proteusframework.data.filesystem

Class DirectoryEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.FileSystemEntity
      • net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.DirectoryEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Entity
public class DirectoryEntity
extends FileSystemEntity
    Represents a directory.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getRevisionLimit

        public int getRevisionLimit()
        Returns the revision limit for files in this directory.
        Returns:
        limit, zero to use the parent's limit or the global limit if this is a root.

      • setRevisionLimit

        public void setRevisionLimit(int revisionLimit)
        Set the revision limit for files in this directory.
        Parameters:
        revisionLimit - The limit to set, see getRevisionLimit() for values.
